subject: Coaches and Managers
Tennis
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, who says she can now serve pain-free, is preparing for the 2014 season opener with a new coach, new off-court challenges and an old rivalry.
snippet: Maria Sharapova, who says she can now serve pain-free, is preparing for the 2014 season opener with a new coach, new off-court challenges and an old rivalry.
